summary: Diana Wynne Jones fans, how would you sort book trilogy Howl's Moving Castle characters (anime movie version was pretty but none...
title: Diana Wynne Jones fans, how would you sort book trilogy Howl's Moving Castle characters (anime movie version was pretty but none of the characters had soul, unlike the books).
body:
In my opinion:
Sophie Hatter- Gryffindor. “…initially reserved and lacking confidence, she demonstrates herself to be a strong-minded individual, becoming less afraid of what others think of her. Dutiful, kind, and considerate, Sophie also has a tendency to be impulsive in her actions and often feels guilty when she does something wrong, though her attempts to rectify matters are usually disastrous.”

Howell Jenkins- A classic Slyther(in) outer: Mysterious, reclusive wizard, with a terrible reputation (he actually spreads the rumours himself).  Known for being very flamboyant and “wicked”. Actually has a really soft heart and is extremely loyal to his family. 

Michael Fisher- Hufflepuff - stubborn, loyal,  "a nice boy, but a bit helpless in a crisis" and also a romantic. 


Letty Hatter-Suliman- Gryffindor with a fiery spirit. I won’t forget how she went to yell at the king for sending her husband on a dangerous mission and he got scared and she went in  labor because of her sheer outrage.




Benjamin Suliman- Ravenclaw? 



Martha Hatter - Slytherin without question. That girl has drive and ambition to be reckoned with. She’s super perceptive and clever, went as an apprentice to a mediocre witch for 2 weeks and managed to create a powerful spell that made her look like her sister Letty so they could switch places because she didn’t want the life her mother meant for her, she wanted to work in a pastry shop,  get married and have 12 children.


Calcifer -Slytherin. “Powerful, cowardly, will fight when the need arises. He is also fairly crabby and a little mean-spirited. Eager to make a bargain. The most perceptive and intelligent character in the Castle.”


Mrs Penstemmon - Ravenclaw, I think? 


Witch of the Waste- Gryffindor - she seems a bit brash and reckless, definitely not very scheming otherwise she wouldn’t have been fooled by her fire demon.

Lily Angorian - not sure? I know she’s scheming but I don’t get a Slytherin vibe from her. Maybe a really chaotic evil Ravenclaw? 


Fanny Hatter- kind, resourceful, opportunistic? Not sure as well? 



Abdullah -  a quirky dreamer who felt he was luckless and  at the bottom of “the pecking order”. Not sure which house he’d be in.


Flower-in-the-Night - “ A well-educated young woman, Flower-in-the-Night is as beautiful as she is clever, but she knows almost nothing beyond what she has read in books.” Ravenclaw, definitely.


Prince Justin - “…cunning, selfish, and opportunistic. He treats the cats unusually well, but doesn’t bother with helping other people unless it benefits him ” THAT MAN IS A SLYTHERIN I TELL YOU :d 


Princess Beatrice- “a strong-minded young woman capable of rugged activities. Among the kidnapped princesses, she is most vocal and defiant, acting as their apparent leader.” This woman is absolute Gryffindor


Charmain Baker- “ she does not know how to do much besides reading (e.g. she does not know how to use hot water to make tea).  Because she often is so focused on only one aspect of a situation, she can fail to see the larger picture.” Not sure?
Peter Regis- either Gryffindor or Hufflepuff?


Matilda Regis- She’s such a forceful and intense personality but I’m not really sure. Slytherin?

summary: You've Got a Friend In Me - SPNxBookworm - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
title: You've Got a Friend In Me - SPNxBookworm - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Summary: 

“It’s bad,” says Ginny, stepping out right behind her brother, her eyes fixing worriedly on her husband, who sits with his knees towards his chest, elbows resting on them while his hands clutch at his hair.

Ron sighs, looking towards his sister. “How bad exactly?”

Ginny’s brow furrows. “He barely ever leaves his study. The case files are all over his desk, Ron.”

His best friend is trapped within the depths of his own mind. It scares him because the only other time he’s ever seen Harry like this is when the War had ended. The guilt and pain and anguish that Harry had carried back then had almost destroyed him.

Ron knows if he doesn’t pull Harry out of his own mind, like he did back then, it will destroy him.

Thank you to my wifeys @chestercbennington and @winchesterpooja for being such cheerleaders. 

Thank you to the lovely @glisseowrites for being such an inspiration. I’ve legit had the balls to write for HP because of you. <3

summary: And if you're still bleeding, you're the lucky ones ‘Cause most of our feelings, they are dead and they are gone We're setting...
caption:
And if you’re still bleeding, you’re the lucky ones
‘Cause most of our feelings, they are dead and they are gone
We’re setting fire to our insides for fun
Collecting pictures from the flood that wrecked our home
It was a flood that wrecked this home

tags: i don't know why I know this
but I do and it's useful when you want to creep out a person's day
summary:
Draco: Hey, did you know- 
Harry: I swear to Merlin, if you tell me another random fact that has popped up on that stupid app I...
body:
Draco: Hey, did you know-

Harry: I swear to Merlin, if you tell me another random fact that has popped up on that stupid app I will leave you and take the phone!

Draco: I was going to say, did you know we’re out of milk.

Harry: Oh. Uhm, sorry.

Draco: That’s okay, but, now we’re on the subject, platypus don’t have nipples and the milk just sweats out of their pores.

Harry: Annnnddd we are never buying milk again.

summary:
*4th Year*
Pansy: Where are you going?
Draco: I heard the champions have to rescue the person they'd miss the most from the...
body:
*4th Year*
Pansy: Where are you going?
Draco: I heard the champions have to rescue the person they'd miss the most from the lake. I'm obviously Potter's person, so I won't wait here until they call me

summary: I was feeling down today, so I tried to counter that feeling by drawing a scene from a fanfic I like. If you’ve never read...
caption: I was feeling down today, so I tried to counter that feeling by drawing a scene from a fanfic I like. If you’ve never read SquadOfCats’ Soup-pocalypse and The Great Curry Cataclysm, please do. It’s so funny and romantic and absurd.

reblog.comment: I was feeling down today, so I tried to counter that feeling by drawing a scene from a fanfic I like. If you’ve never read SquadOfCats’ Soup-pocalypse and The Great Curry Cataclysm, please do. It’s so funny and romantic and absurd.

tags: now i just need a fave who eats healthy
summary: I realized I tend to eat my fandoms. Like whatever I’m into tends to define my eating patterns. When I’m playing or watching a...
body:
I realized I tend to eat my fandoms.

Like whatever I’m into tends to define my eating patterns.

When I’m playing or watching a medieval fantasy I tend to crave stews, bread and cheeses. 

Reading Game of Thrones made me try red wine for the first time.

Playing Skyrim had me craving cinnamon rolls. 

Harry Potter makes me want pumpkin pie.

I drank soda while playing Fallout 4 and I never drink soda.

If my favorite character eats or drinks a certain thing, I will want it. 

Its probably the best way to advertise to me. If Thor started drinking Dr. Pepper in every film, I’d question how it even got to Asgard, but I’d likely buy some Dr.  Pepper.

summary: Hi can I get a ship? I love this idea! I’m 5’5”, pretty pale, black eyes, dark brown hair. I’m super introverted. Ravenclaw. I’m...
question: Hi can I get a ship? I love this idea! I’m 5’5”, pretty pale, black eyes, dark brown hair. I’m super introverted. Ravenclaw. I’m a teacher too.
answer:
I ship you with Bill Weasley!

Someone as knowledgable and clever as you is a great match for the treasure hunter. Bill considers it a challenge to draw you out of your shell, enticing laughter from your lips with smooth flirtatious gestures. 

As a Weasley through-and-through, he’s not the kind to give up easy, and eventually he weeds his way into your heart. He loves to compare your eyes to the onyx gems that he finds on jobs for Gringotts, and he’s brought them back for you on more than one occasion. You’re his treasure.

Welcome to ralph-n-fiennes, a fanpage (active only on Tumblr and Instagram) dedicated to british actor Ralph Fiennes! Here you will find up to date news, including photos and videos!
For any inquiries, feel free to ask.
This blog is NOT related and/or affiliated to Ralph Fiennes and/or any of his representatives or affiliates in any possible way.
